backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the removal of blur backgrounds from text lines in the memories page, with high confidence and test ID REQ-1.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing a multi-page romantic website with photo galleries, interactive questions, animations, and navigation.
frontend/index.css: Duplicate Tailwind configuration file with CSS custom properties for light and dark mode color schemes using OKLCH format.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx, titled 'Love Letter'.
frontend/README.md: Documentation instructing users how to replace 9 placeholder photos (photo1.jpg through photo9.jpg) in the assets directory to personalize the romantic website.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React Router setup defining 6 routes (landing, memories, understanding, one-chance, game, final) wrapped in a Layout component.
frontend/src/components/ActionButtonsSec: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ClosingSection.t: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing pink background, floating hearts animation, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution for all pages.
Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/UnderstandingSec: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, query caching, and automatic invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeartAnimation.ts: Custom hook that creates and animates 20 floating heart emojis across the viewport with random positioning and sizes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS with custom OKLCH color system for romantic pink/gold theme, glowing text effects, floating hearts animations, photo collage backgrounds, and responsive utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point wrapping App with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering to root element.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Final page displaying glowing commitment message in Hinglish, consolidated subtext paragraph, automatic heart animation on mount, and back navigation button.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Interactive question page with animated 'No' button that moves on click and a 'Yes' button that triggers heart animations and displays confirmation messages.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with a centered heading, subtitle text, and a button that navigates to the memories page.
frontend/src/pages/MemoriesPage.tsx: Displays a photo collage background with overlay effects and a list of memory captions rendered as text with drop-shadow styling.
frontend/src/pages/OneChancePage.tsx: Page with two interactive buttons where 'Try Again' triggers hearts and love message, while 'Time' button moves randomly on click.
frontend/src/pages/UnderstandingPage.tsx: Simple text-based page displaying apology and commitment messages with navigation buttons to previous and next pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, pink/gold color palettes, custom shadows, and animation definitions including float, fadeIn, and glow.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a fix request to remove blur backgrounds from text lines in the memories page.
